entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
